title: TRADING T206's I'll give you 2 for 1
author: WillowGrove

posts.post_title: TRADING T206's I'll give you 2 for 1
posts.post_content:
Soon after I found this site a few months ago I posted my wantlist of T206's with the goal of trading my duplicates for the cards I needed.  

But judging by how few reponses I got, I think my request was flawed because collectors who may be attempting a set do not have many duplicates to deal.  Or not.  I can't be sure.

Either way, in an attempt to entice more of you to respond I would like to offer you 2 commons for every 1 common t206 you trade me.  Same for HOFers.

Essentially I'm saying I'll give ya a good deal.  And sure we can include some cash as needed.

I'm looking for non-graded cards in at least gd+.  The cards I have to trade are in varied conditions averaging about gd+ as well.

Why would I prefer to trade?  It's either because I acquired most of my cards by 1980 when the hobby was more about trading.  Or it could be because I'd find it pretty funny that in 2010 some of us would actually be trading t206's the same way kids did in 1910.

Probably for both reasons.

I hope I can give you a great deal on the cards you're looking for and complete my set while doing so.  Thanks for looking.   -peter
 
Long Lists below.....
